name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, players of the domestic mobile game "Identity V" found out that the production team had a preference for the game character "Entomologist" and had some ulterior motives in the skin design. It is suspected that many elements in the skin are related to the wedding of the game's chief planner and his wife. Angry players then began to trace back and find fault with the game, and found that the game had released a game skin for a Japanese character on the National Memorial Day and misspelled China in the event. Therefore, many players cursed the game online as a "traitor game."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Two more people have been added to the Taiwan independence list. On October 14, Chen Binhua, spokesperson for the Taiwan Affairs Office of the State Council, said that after carefully checking and identifying the clues and information reported by people on both sides of the Taiwan Strait to the Taiwan Affairs Office to collect clues and reports on "Taiwan independence" diehards, it was decided to punish Shen Boyang, Cao Xingcheng and the "Black Bear Academy" in accordance with the law. The 16th President of the Republic of China, Lai Ching-te, is still not on this list.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The then municipal party secretary during the Urumqi high-rise fire incident was investigated.
According to the website of the Central Commission for Discipline Inspection and the National Supervisory Commission on October 14, Yang Fasen, member of the Standing Committee of the Qinghai Provincial Party Committee and Secretary of the Political and Legal Affairs Commission, was suspected of serious violations of discipline and law and voluntarily surrendered. He is currently under investigation. Prior to this, he had disappeared for three months.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: To cooperate with the "Joint Sword 2024B" exercise, the Bilibili up master "Eastern Theater" released an animated video "Strangle" with the introduction "The greater the provocation, the tighter the stranglehold. The heavy hammer falls to the ground, and the sword pierces the heart." Subsequently, the official website of the Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China also reposted this video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Primary school students? On October 14, CCTV.com published an article titled "Xi Jinping: Literature and Art Should Love the People and Sincerely Be the People's Primary School Students", reviewing Xi Jinping's speech at a symposium on literature and art work ten years ago. In the speech, Xi Jinping mentioned that literature and art should love the people and sincerely be the people's primary school students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 14, a netizen submitted a PPT of an expert from a certain school talking about Internet governance.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, investors went to the Zhongrong Trust business department in Hangzhou, Zhejiang to ask for explanations and money. They were very emotional and many people knelt down. The general manager called the police to disperse the investors. It is reported that Zhongrong has been suspended for more than a year. As a state-owned trust company controlled by a central enterprise, Zhongrong Trust has not issued any announcements or explanations, and does not allow investors to go to the Beijing headquarters to petition. The total amount of Zhongrong Trust's products suspended is close to 400 billion, and the number of investors is close to 70,000.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 12, an 18-year-old senior student hanged herself in Jianxing Middle School in Nanbu County, Nanchong City, Sichuan Province. The parents suspected that the child was bullied at school before his death. An insider said that the child had bruises all over his body. After the incident, the school strictly blocked the news and did not allow photography at the scene.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a 26-year IBM employee faced layoffs and confronted the head of Greater China. On October 8, he sent a letter of complaint, citing issues such as IBM Greater China Chairman Chen Xudong accepting gifts from channels, privately leaking company secrets, making wrong decisions, forming cliques, appointing people based on personal connections, and retaliating against disobedient employees. IBM Greater China responded that it "attaches great importance and will conduct a thorough investigation."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, at Guomao City, Hongfu Road subway station in Dongguan, Guangdong, a teenager participated in a cosplay event. He was grabbed and accused by a middle-aged man for dressing up as a Japanese samurai, and the man called 110 to report to the police.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Because they were still charged 3.8 yuan for a mobile phone package after their mobile phone service was shut down, East China University of Political Science and Law student Lin and members of the rights protection group sued Shanghai Mobile. The case was filed on October 12.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 13, a criminal case caused by personal conflicts and disputes occurred in Longtangbao Village, Feixiang Town, Feixiang District, Handan City, resulting in the death of two people on the spot and one person dying after failed rescue efforts.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On October 11, the People's Court Daily used an entire page to publish the Mudanjiang Intermediate People's Court's announcement on the corruption case of Li Chuanliang, the former vice mayor of Jixi City, Heilongjiang Province. Li Chuanliang's 1,021 properties were seized, and the assets involved in the case exceeded 3.1 billion. It is reported that Li Chuanliang has fled abroad to avoid investigation and transferred part of the stolen money involved in the case abroad. He once said, "Without the people of Jixi, I am nothing."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 14, Hong Kong University of Science and Technology. Workers demanded their wages in front of Li Ka-shing's Innovation Building.
